snippet: With Israel and other world powers focusing on the Arab Spring and the mounting tensions with Iran, the Palestinian issue has effectively been shelved, leaving Palestinian leaders at a loss.
abstract: Palestinians, for decades at the center of Middle Eastern politics, find themselves marginalized, as Israel and other world powers focus on the mounting tensions with Iran; result is a serial splintering of the Palestinian Authority, a loss of state sponsors and paralysis for those trying to build a state next to Israel.
lead_paragraph: With Israel and other world powers focusing on the Arab Spring and the mounting tensions with Iran, the Palestinian issue has effectively been shelved, leaving Palestinian leaders at a loss.

headline.seo: Arab Spring and Iran Tensions Leave Palestinians Sidelined

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
